snippet: WEST--Paul B.,on July 20, 2016. Patent attorney at Ladas & Parry LLP, avid skier, tennis player, devotee of art and music. Beloved companion of Judith Grandes, loving brother of Margo Otis, devoted uncle of Tracy, Steven and Martha Otis. 1/3...
lead_paragraph: WEST--Paul B.,on July 20, 2016. Patent attorney at Ladas & Parry LLP, avid skier, tennis player, devotee of art and music. Beloved companion of Judith Grandes, loving brother of Margo Otis, devoted uncle of Tracy, Steven and Martha Otis. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  WEST, PAUL B.
